response.original_title: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia Day 2: Rose
response.overview: Roselia Live: Episode of Roselia was a two-day solo concert by Roselia.  It was held on May 21 and 22, 2022 at Fuji-Q Highland Conifer Forest. The first day was titled "Wei√üklee", while the second day was titled "Rose".  Both days were livebroadcasted in certain movie theaters in Japan, South Korea, Taiwan and Hong Kong.[1]
